data.lyric:
[ti:Pain Away(feat. Lil Durk)]
[ar:Meek Mill/Lil Durk]
[al:QUARANTINE PACK]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Pain Away(feat. Lil Durk) - Meek Mill/Lil Durk
[00:06.74]Lyrics by：Robert Williams/Durk Banks/Larry Griffin/Stuart Lowery/Clemon Riley/Raphael Saadiq/Carl Wheeler/Dwayne Wiggins
[00:20.24]Meek Mill：
[00:21.36]Yeah woo
[00:23.50]We was in the trenches tryna get it out the mud
[00:26.23]Lookin' up to killers tryna figure who I was
[00:29.20]Sold the Richard Porter I just wanna feel the love
[00:31.99]I feel like a Crip 'cause I can't even trust my blood
[00:34.87]Blood
[00:36.45]Loyalty
[00:37.10]You know what loyalty is
[00:39.04]I say "Spoil me"
[00:40.07]You ain't my dawg you fallin' out about no lawyer fee
[00:42.65]No lawyer fee
[00:43.28]You had a brick and I ain't even have a quarter key
[00:45.95]You never seen my hand out I knew it was more to me
[00:48.84]It's more than us to see our sons and all our daughters eat
[00:51.57]'Cause I got cops tryna lock me opps out tryna slaughter me
[00:54.45]But I stay prayed up loadin' all these K's up
[00:57.35]'Cause I ain't get advicе from all them nights back when I stayed up
[01:00.10]Don't hit mе 'bout no show if you ain't come to set the stage up
[01:02.95]We God body threw a thousand shots they barely grazed us
[01:06.98]And I can't let 'em make my grave up
[01:08.92]I just hope this money take the pain away
[01:14.07]And I've been tryna save my money for a rainy day
[01:19.80]But I just bought that Rolls truck to take the pain away
[01:26.45]And all these diamonds give me confidence
[01:28.55]Don't judge my pain if you don't know the s**t that I'm against ayy
[01:31.67]Lil Durk：
[01:31.95]The Percocet'll take your pain away
[01:33.35]Pain away
[01:34.57]One n***a tellin' will take the gang away
[01:36.33]The gang away
[01:36.89]Washin' blood with bleach don't wash the stain away
[01:39.02]The stain away
[01:40.04]Seen my brother die he died the strangest way
[01:42.24]Stranger way
[01:42.80]Hangin' with the real won't hang with lames today
[01:45.24]Lames today
[01:45.83]Bein' counted out I had to make a way
[01:48.17]Make a way
[01:48.65]Snaked by one of my dawgs I had to stay away
[01:50.79]Stay away
[01:51.62]Millions dollar cash put up for a rainy day
[01:53.80]Rainy day
[01:54.60]For a rainy
[01:56.45]Durkio I'm different with it
[01:57.95]Different with it
[01:58.53]I praise the trenches like I ain't lose none of my n***as in it
[02:00.73]N***as in it
[02:01.23]I pray my daughter don't go through what I go with different women
[02:03.79]Different women
[02:04.76]And I'm talking 'bout all the different n***as
[02:06.58]Different n***as
[02:08.26]And I don't get these n***as
[02:09.37]Get these n***as
[02:09.92]Why these n***as tryna hang like they ain't lynchin' n***as
[02:12.22]They ain't lynchin' n***as
[02:12.78]The opposition be sayin' my name tryna get attention with it
[02:15.26]Get attention with it
[02:15.93]I know an opp he was suspect now he a victim with it
[02:18.03]Victim with it
[02:18.55]Meek Mill：
[02:18.85]I just hope this money take the pain away
[02:23.46]And I've been tryna save my money for a rainy day
[02:29.19]But I just bought the Rolls truck to take the pain away
[02:35.83]And all these diamonds give me confidence
[02:37.97]Don't judge my pain if you don't know the s**t that I'm against ayy
data.trans:
[ti:Pain Away(feat. Lil Durk)]
[ar:Meek Mill/Lil Durk]
[al:QUARANTINE PACK]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:06.74]//
[00:20.24]//
[00:21.36]//
[00:23.50]我们曾经在贫民窟 想要出人头地
[00:26.23]渴望成为杀手 想要搞清楚我是谁
[00:29.20]做着街头买卖 我只想感受爱
[00:31.99]我感觉我是个瘸帮成员 因为我不能相信我的血肉之亲
[00:34.87]血肉之亲
[00:36.45]忠诚
[00:37.10]你知道忠诚是什么吗
[00:39.04]我说 宠爱我
[00:40.07]你不是我兄弟 你因为一点小事就和我闹翻
[00:42.65]一点小事
[00:43.28]你那时那么有钱 而我什么都没有
[00:45.95]你对需要帮助的我视而不见 我知道那对我来说意味着什么
[00:48.84]仅仅是让我们的儿女吃饱饭还不够
[00:51.57]因为警察想要把我关起来 对手想要把我消灭掉
[00:54.45]但我一直祈祷着 也随时准备着枪
[00:57.35]因为我没有从过去熬过的夜里得到任何教训
[01:00.10]如果你还没有设置好舞台 就不要找我谈演出的事
[01:02.95]我们的身体就像神仙 他们打了一千发子弹 而我们几乎毫发无伤
[01:06.98]我不能让他们把我送进坟墓
[01:08.92]我只希望钞票能带走我的痛苦
[01:14.07]我想存点钱 以备不时之需
[01:19.80]但我刚买了劳斯莱斯 只想消除我的痛苦
[01:26.45]这些钻石给了我自信
[01:28.55]如果你不知道我面对着什么 就不要因为我的痛苦而对我指指点点
[01:31.67]//
[01:31.95]那种药片会带走你的痛苦
[01:33.35]带走痛苦
[01:34.57]一个人告密 整个帮派都完蛋
[01:36.33]帮派完蛋
[01:36.89]用漂白剂清洗鲜血 洗不掉血迹
[01:39.02]洗不掉血迹
[01:40.04]看着我的兄弟死去 他死得好奇怪
[01:42.24]很奇怪
[01:42.80]和真诚的人一起混 如今不和废物为伍了
[01:45.24]如今废物真多
[01:45.83]曾经不被看好 我必须闯出去
[01:48.17]闯出去
[01:48.65]被我的兄弟背叛 我必须远离他
[01:50.79]远离
[01:51.62]数百万美元 以备不时之需
[01:53.80]不时之需
[01:54.60]以备不时之需
[01:56.45]Durkio 我是与众不同的人
[01:57.95]与众不同的人
[01:58.53]我赞美贫民窟 好像我没有在这里失去过任何兄弟
[02:00.73]失去兄弟
[02:01.23]我希望我的女儿不要重蹈我的覆辙 不要被别人欺骗
[02:03.79]不同的女人
[02:04.76]我说的是那些男人
[02:06.58]不同的男人
[02:08.26]我不理解这些家伙
[02:09.37]理解这些家伙
[02:09.92]为何这些家伙想要伤害别人 好像他们没有良心
[02:12.22]他们没有良心
[02:12.78]对手一直在说我坏话 想要吸引我的注意
[02:15.26]吸引我的注意
[02:15.93]我认识一个对手 他曾经是嫌犯 现在他是受害者
[02:18.03]变成受害者
[02:18.55]//
[02:18.85]我只希望钞票能带走我的痛苦
[02:23.46]我想存点钱 以备不时之需
[02:29.19]但我刚买了劳斯莱斯 只想消除我的痛苦
[02:35.83]这些钻石给了我自信
[02:37.97]如果你不知道我面对着什么 就不要因为我的痛苦而对我指指点点
